subject: America's Cup
Sailboats and Sailing
lead_paragraph: In becoming the first U.S. city to host since 1995, San Francisco beat out Newport, R.I.; a city in Italy; and an undisclosed bidder believed to be in the Middle East.
snippet: In becoming the first U.S. city to host since 1995, San Francisco beat out Newport, R.I.; a city in Italy; and an undisclosed bidder believed to be in the Middle East.
